alert.note: Alert for Sherman; Wallace (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Snow Squall Warning issued February 22 at 6:44PM CST until February 22 at 7:15PM CST by NWS Goodland
info.description: The National Weather Service in Goodland has issued a * Snow Squall Warning for... Wallace County in west central Kansas... Sherman County in northwestern Kansas... * Until 615 PM MST. * At 544 PM MST, a dangerous snow squall was located along a line extending from 6 miles north of Bonny Reservoir to near Weskan, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Poor visibility in heavy snow and blowing snow. Wind gusts up to 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar and webcams. IMPACT...Dangerous life-threatening travel. * Locations impacted include... Goodland, Sharon Springs, Kanorado, Ruleton, Weskan, Wallace and Edson. This includes Interstate 70 in Kansas between mile markers 1 and 35. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Reduce your speed and turn on headlights! During snow squalls, the visibility may suddenly drop to near zero in whiteout conditions.
